wlv.mt.tools
Class Giza

java.lang.Object
  wlv.mt.tools.Resource
      wlv.mt.tools.Giza

public class Giza
extends Resource

This class models the information stored in a giza translation file
In order to minimise the amount of giza information we store in memory, we will only hold in the translations for those words found in the source text

Author:
cat
